author: Kortholt, Christian, 1633-1694
title: Disputationum theologicarum de variis Scripturæ Sacræ editionibus II Roberto Card. Bellarmino, hujusqve defensori, Jacobo Gretsero, et vindicatori nupero, Vito Erbermanno, Jesuitis, oppositarum Præside Christiano Kortholt publicæ disqvisitioni committit J
